prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to carry heavy objects and works hard.
Design a tough-looking Fighting-type Pokemon that stands strong against opponents.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and enjoys lifting logs.
Imagine a small, bipedal Pokemon with a unique color scheme and a friendly demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves into a stronger fighter and has a cheeky personality.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that is often found in urban areas helping out.
Make a Pokemon that embodies hard work and determination, perfect for teamwork.
